column10: What would you currently change about MineScape mechanics?
column11: What is our biggest holdback from growing as a community?
column12: Does the current staff team provide the required maintenance to perform daily functions?
column13: In order to provide an immersive experience and retain players through interactive gameplay. Is AFK gameplay inclusive in this vision?
column14: What is your solution to exploits and gameplay manipulation?
column15: If you could add one mechanic to the game what would it be?
column16: What needs to be focused on when developing the server and subsequent infrastructure to provide seamless gameplay?

column10: Nothing really, I would focus more on expanding mechanics that we already have
column11: Doing too little advertising for the gamemodes besides MineScape.
column14: Having reasons attractive enough for people to report these things instead of using them.
column15: I would add a usable ingame map, using the standard minecraft map, so that people wont have to open a browser to check where they are (and maybe other people (party members) aswell)
column16: Every core game needs to be equally accessible, so that no game is more seen and thus played for this reason.

column10: I heard some players suggest to make combat more minecrafty so maybe thats a good thing to change?
column15: Special attacks for weapons would be very cool

column14: Figuring them out, fizing them, punishing the exploiters.

column10: I would love to be able to use the toilets build into houses
column11: Well, you know, the fact that half the staff smells like they have been hugging a 6 month old bag of doritos in their moms basement certainly doesnt welcome new players. I can smell from all the way over here
column14: Exploit once, reset, exploit twice: tempban + reset, exploit 3 times, byebye

column10: many skills need to be rebalanced

column15: random events! anything that adds more interactivity to the game!
column16: subsequent to lag and bug fixing possibly improving various skill mechanics and give more information on the game while in the game. more chat prompts or pop-up menus for skills when completing actions things like that
